text: [Music] hello everyone welcome back to our Channel have you ever wondered how the delicious almonds you enjoy every day make their way from the orchard to your table today we're going to take you on an incredible journey through the entire process of almond production from planting the first seedling to delivering the final product to Consumers you'll get an inside look at the fascinating world of almond farming so grab a snack maybe even some almonds and let's get started [Applause] the Journey Begins in mid-February when Farmers plant almond seedlings this timing is crucial as it allows the young plants to develop buds during the optimal growing season [Music] Farmers carefully plant each seedling ensuring they have enough space to grow and thrive [Music] protective covers are then placed over the seedlings to Shield them from pests like stems and to limit excessive sunlight giving these young plants the best start possible over the next 2 years these seedlings grow into young almond trees during this period farmers must provide consistent care to ensure Healthy Growth almond trees are water intensive requiring regular irrigation drip irrigation systems are commonly used to provide a steady supply of water directly to the roots conserving water while keeping the trees hydrated as the trees grow Farmers monitor their health looking out for any signs of disease or pest infestation [Music] pruning is another essential part of Almond Tree Care usually done at the beginning of winter pruning helps shape the trees remove dead or disease branches and promote better air circulation this careful maintenance is crucial for the trees to produce high quality almonds in the future by the third year the almond trees begin to Blossom typically between February and March this is a magical time in The Orchards as the trees are covered in beautiful white and pink flowers but these blossoms are not just a visual Delight they play a critical role in Almond production during the blooming period millions of honeybees are brought into the Orchards to pollinate the flowers this is a for the trees to produce almonds the sight of bees buzzing around diligently pollinating each flower is a testament to the harmony between Agriculture and nature without these hardworking bees almond production would not be [Music] possible after pollination the flowers begin to develop in almonds over the next 5 to 6 months these almonds grow and mature on the trees drawing nutrients from the soil and water from the irrigation systems the almonds develop a hard shell to protect the nut inside which will eventually become the delicious snack we all [Music] love when the almonds are ready for Harvest typically in late summer to early fall the orchards are buzzing with activ [Music] ity hey [Music] specially designed machines are brought in to shake the trees causing the almonds to fall to the ground this process is quite efficient and is similar to how olives or cherries are harvested the Fallen almonds are then collected ready for the next stage of their Journey [Music] [Applause] [Music] [Music] once harvested the almonds are transported to a drying area in some regions particularly in the Middle East almonds are spread out Under the Sun for about a week to dry this traditional method helps reduce moisture content ensuring the almonds are properly preserved for storage and [Music] processing after drying the almonds are transported to processing facilities here they go through several stages including cleaning sorting and shelling Advanced Machinery is used to remove the outer shells leaving the edible almonds ready for further processing the almonds are then sorted based on size and quality ensuring only the best ones make it to the final packaging [Music] stage the final step in the Almond journey is packaging and distribution at the processing facility the cleaned and sorted almonds are packaged in various forms whole sliced or ground depending on consumer demand packaging is done with great care to maintain freshness and prevent contamination once packaged the almonds are ready to be distributed to markets and stores around the world they are loaded onto trucks and shipped to various destinations ensuring that consumers everywhere can enjoy fresh highquality almonds and there you have it the complete journey of almonds from the orchard to your table it's a process that requires dedication precision and a deep respect for nature the next time you enjoy a handful of almonds you'll know just how much effort goes into bringing this nutritious snack to you thank you for joining us on this fascinating Journey we hope you enjoyed learning about the incredible process of almond production don't forget to like subscribe and leave a comment below with your thoughts see you in the next video [Music] he hey he he [Music]
